daily_plan_req: Isabella Rodriguez cooks at 8am everyday, and works at the counter until 12pm, at which point relaxes. After waking up , she switch on the furnace.  She switch off the furnace at 10 am.
name: Isabella Rodriguez
learned: Isabella likes to cook relax and stay at home.

lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez goes to bed around 1pm, awakes up around 6am.
daily_req: wake up and complete the morning routine at 6:00 am
work at the counter from 9:00 am to 12:00 pm
relax and have lunch at 12:00 pm
complete any additional tasks or errands in the afternoon
return home and cook dinner at 6:00 pm
spend the evening with family or friends
turn on the furnace at 9:00 pm
